title: Column icons don't display when connecting to Derby database
description: When connecting to a Derby database in the Available Items section of the application, the column icons are not showing up.
OB: When expanding the Data Source in the Available Items section, the table icons appear but the column icons do not appear.
EB: Expected behavior is that when expanding the Data Source in the Available Items section, both table icons and column icons should be displayed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the application and go to the Available Items section.
2. Expand the Data Source by clicking the related icon.
3. Check if the table icons are displayed.
4. Check if the column icons are displayed.
